body:
Hello @MichielStock! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - In the file [`pandas/core/series.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/be69d5daf7163596d54b5ba769a695ce6bc605f6/pandas/core/series.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 2612:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/be69d5daf7163596d54b5ba769a695ce6bc605f6/pandas/core/series.py#L2612): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (85 > 79 characters)
